mapper.insert: insert into user ( username, password, birthday, gender, email, account_non_expired, account_non_locked, credentials_non_expired, enabled, role_id ) values( #{username}, #{password}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{accountNonExpired}, #{accountNonLocked}, #{credentialsNonExpired}, #{enabled}, #{roleId});
mapper.select: select user.id, user.username, user.password, user.enabled, user.account_non_expired, user.account_non_locked, user.credentials_non_expired, role.role_name as role, role.role_label as roleLabel, role.role_id as roleId, user.avatar, user.email, user.birthday, user.gender from user, roles, role where user.username = #{username} and roles.user_id = user.id and roles.role_id = role.role_id;
